verses.verse: O <WG5599> foolish <WG453> Galatians <WG1052>, who <WG5101> hath bewitched <WG940> you <WG5209>, that ye should <WG3982> not <WG3361> obey <WG3982> the truth <WG225>, before <WG2596> whose <WG3739> eyes <WG3788> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> hath been evidently set forth <WG4270>, crucified <WG4717> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>?

This <WG5124> only <WG3440> would <WG2309> I learn <WG3129> of <WG575> you <WG5216>, Received ye <WG2983> the Spirit <WG4151> by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law <WG3551>, or <WG2228> by <WG1537> the hearing <WG189> of faith <WG4102>?
Are ye <WG2075> so <WG3779> foolish <WG453>? having begun <WG1728> in the Spirit <WG4151>, are ye <WG2005> now <WG3568> made perfect <WG2005> by the flesh <WG4561>?
Have ye suffered <WG3958> so many things <WG5118> in vain <WG1500>? if it be yet <WG1489> <WG2532> in vain <WG1500>. so many: or, so great

He therefore <WG3767> that ministereth <WG2023> to you <WG5213> the Spirit <WG4151>, and <WG2532> worketh <WG1754> miracles <WG1411> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, doeth he it by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law <WG3551>, or <WG2228> by <WG1537> the hearing <WG189> of faith <WG4102>?
Even as <WG2531> Abraham <WG11> believed <WG4100> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> it was accounted <WG3049> to him <WG846> for <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>. accounted: or, imputed
Know ye <WG1097> therefore <WG686> that <WG3754> they which are of <WG1537> faith <WG4102>, the same <WG3778> are <WG1526> the children <WG5207> of Abraham <WG11>.

And <WG1161> the scripture <WG1124>, foreseeing <WG4275> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> would justify <WG1344> the heathen <WG1484> through <WG1537> faith <WG4102>, preached before the gospel <WG4283> unto Abraham <WG11>, saying, <WG3754> In <WG1722> thee <WG4671> shall <WG1757> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484> be blessed <WG1757>.
So then <WG5620> they which be of <WG1537> faith <WG4102> are blessed <WG2127> with <WG4862> faithful <WG4103> Abraham <WG11>.

For <WG1063> as many as <WG3745> are <WG1526> of <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law <WG3551> are <WG1526> under <WG5259> the curse <WG2671>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, Cursed <WG1944> is every one <WG3956> that <WG3739> continueth <WG1696> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956> which <WG3588> are written <WG1125> in <WG1722> the book <WG975> of the law <WG3551> to do <WG4160> them <WG846>.

But <WG1161> that <WG3754> no man <WG3762> is justified <WG1344> by <WG1722> the law <WG3551> in the sight <WG3844> of God <WG2316>, it is evident <WG1212>: for <WG3754>, The just <WG1342> shall live <WG2198> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>.
And <WG1161> the law <WG3551> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> faith <WG4102>: but <WG235>, The man <WG444> that doeth <WG4160> them <WG846> shall live <WG2198> in <WG1722> them <WG846>.

Christ <WG5547> hath redeemed <WG1805> us <WG2248> from <WG1537> the curse <WG2671> of the law <WG3551>, being made <WG1096> a curse <WG2671> for <WG5228> us <WG2257>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, Cursed <WG1944> is every one <WG3956> that hangeth <WG2910> on <WG1909> a tree <WG3586>:

That <WG2443> the blessing <WG2129> of Abraham <WG11> might come <WG1096> on <WG1519> the Gentiles <WG1484> through <WG1722> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>; that <WG2443> we might receive <WG2983> the promise <WG1860> of the Spirit <WG4151> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102>.

Brethren <WG80>, I speak <WG3004> after the manner of <WG2596> men <WG444>; Though it be but <WG3676> a man's <WG444> covenant <WG1242>, yet if it be confirmed <WG2964>, no man <WG3762> disannulleth <WG114>, or <WG2228> addeth thereto <WG1928>. covenant: or, testament

Now <WG1161> to Abraham <WG11> and <WG2532> his <WG846> seed <WG4690> were <WG4483> the promises <WG1860> made <WG4483>. He saith <WG3004> not <WG3756>, And <WG2532> to seeds <WG4690>, as <WG5613> of <WG1909> many <WG4183>; but <WG235> as <WG5613> of <WG1909> one <WG1520>, And <WG2532> to thy <WG4675> seed <WG4690>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> Christ <WG5547>.

And <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG3004>, that the covenant <WG1242>, that was confirmed before <WG4300> of <WG5259> God <WG2316> in <WG1519> Christ <WG5547>, the law <WG3551>, which was <WG1096> four hundred <WG5071> and <WG2532> thirty <WG5144> years <WG2094> after <WG3326>, cannot <WG3756> disannul <WG208>, that <WG1519> it should make <WG2673> the promise <WG1860> of none effect <WG2673>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the inheritance <WG2817> be of <WG1537> the law <WG3551>, it is no more <WG3765> of <WG1537> promise <WG1860>: but <WG1161> God <WG2316> gave <WG5483> it to Abraham <WG11> by <WG1223> promise <WG1860>.

Wherefore <WG5101> then <WG3767> serveth the law <WG3551>? It was added <WG4369> because of <WG5484> transgressions <WG3847>, till <WG891> <WG3739> the seed <WG4690> should come <WG2064> to whom <WG3739> the promise was made <WG1861>; and it was ordained <WG1299> by <WG1223> angels <WG32> in <WG1722> the hand <WG5495> of a mediator <WG3316>.
Now <WG1161> a mediator <WG3316> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> a mediator of one <WG1520>, but <WG1161> God <WG2316> is <WG2076> one <WG1520>.

Is the law <WG3551> then <WG3767> against <WG2596> the promises <WG1860> of God <WG2316>? God forbid <WG3361> <WG1096>: for <WG1063> if <WG1487> there had been <WG1325> a law <WG3551> given <WG1325> which <WG3588> could <WG1410> have given life <WG2227>, verily <WG3689> righteousness <WG1343> should <WG302> have been <WG2258> by <WG1537> the law <WG3551>.

But <WG235> the scripture <WG1124> hath concluded <WG4788> all <WG3956> under <WG5259> sin <WG266>, that <WG2443> the promise <WG1860> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> might be given <WG1325> to them that believe <WG4100>.

But <WG1161> before <WG4253> faith <WG4102> came <WG2064>, we were kept <WG5432> under <WG5259> the law <WG3551>, shut up <WG4788> unto <WG1519> the faith <WG4102> which should afterwards <WG3195> be revealed <WG601>.
Wherefore <WG5620> the law <WG3551> was <WG1096> our <WG2257> schoolmaster <WG3807> to bring us unto <WG1519> Christ <WG5547>, that <WG2443> we might be justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>.
But <WG1161> after that faith <WG4102> is come <WG2064>, we are <WG2070> no longer <WG2089> <WG3765> under <WG5259> a schoolmaster <WG3807>.
For <WG1063> ye are <WG2075> all <WG3956> the children <WG5207> of God <WG2316> by <WG1223> faith <WG4102> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.
For <WG1063> as many of you as <WG3745> have been baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> have put on <WG1746> Christ <WG5547>.

There is <WG1762> neither <WG3756> Jew <WG2453> nor <WG3761> Greek <WG1672>, there is <WG1762> neither <WG3756> bond <WG1401> nor <WG3761> free <WG1658>, there is <WG1762> neither <WG3756> male <WG730> nor <WG2532> female <WG2338>: for <WG1063> ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> all <WG3956> one <WG1520> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.
And <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye <WG5210> be Christ's <WG5547>, then <WG686> are ye <WG2075> Abraham's <WG11> seed <WG4690>, and <WG2532> heirs <WG2818> according <WG2596> to the promise <WG1860>.
